struct module * nc_owner
 Owner module for this policy descriptor; policies registering from a different module to the one the NRS framework is held within (currently ptlrpc), should set this field to THIS_MODULE.

 Policy registration flags; a bitmast of nrs_policy_flags.

const char* ptlrpc_nrs_pol_conf::nc_compat_svc_name

Set for policies that support a single ptlrpc service, i.e.

ones that have pd_compat set to nrs_policy_compat_one(). The variable value depicts the name of the single service that such policies are compatible with.

Definition at line 418 of file lustre_nrs.h.

Referenced by ptlrpc_nrs_policy_register().
